00033 #ifndef __LOADER_ARCH_H__
00034 #define __LOADER_ARCH_H__
00035 
00036 /**
00037  * Load a program from EEPROM.
00038  *
00039  * This function loads a program from EEPROM into the flash ROM (code) and RAM (data).
00040  *
00041  * \param code The address of the first byte of code in the EEPROM.
00042  *
00043  * \param codelen The length of the code.
00044  *
00045  * \param data The address of the first byte of data in the EEPROM.
00046  *
00047  * \param datalen The length of the data.
00048  *
00049  */
00050 void loader_arch_load(unsigned short startaddr);
00051 
00052 /**
00053  * Unload a program.
00054  *
00055  * This function should not be called directly, but accessed through
00056  * the macro LOADER_UNLOAD(). The function unloads a program from both
00057  * RAM and ROM.
00058  *
00059  * \param codeaddr A pointer to the first byte of program code.
00060  *
00061  * \param dataaddr A pointer to the first byte of program data.
00062  */
00063 void loader_arch_free(void *codeaddr, void *dataaddr);
00064 
00065 extern void *loader_arch_codeaddr, *loader_arch_dataaddr;
00066 
00067 #ifndef LOADER_UNLOAD
00068 #define LOADER_UNLOAD() loader_arch_free(&loader_arch_codeaddr, &loader_arch_dataaddr)
00069 #endif
00070 
00071 #define LOADER_ARCH_MAGIC 0x373a
00072 #define LOADER_ARCH_VERSION 0x0001
00073 
00074 #endif /* __LOADER_ARCH_H__ */
